page.title: 20Burscough-Present-Concerns
page.content:
The second local concern relates to local farmers who are worried about such issues as "anti-farming" pressures,withdrawal of grants for small farmers,and concern over E.E.C. farming policieswhich are seen as giving more help to continental farmers. Finally unemployment is a major concern.
It is particularly high amongst young school leavers many of whom will have to leave the area to find jobs.s
THE SURVEYS AND INFORMATION COLLECTED FOR THIS TEXT HAVE BEEN:- Collected by pupils of Priory High School Organised by the Geography Department. Presented by the Computer Department.
